_header: Lord I yield me guilty / That I never fed the hungry
Subjects: prayers, of confession; mercy, works of
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Addit. 22283 [Simeon]: not in this MS.
_description: A confession for negligence of the Works of Mercy — four 6-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Lord I ȝelde me gultiÞat I neuere fedde þe
                    hungri…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat I may comen aftur my dedAnd wonen euere lord
                    wiþ þe. Amen.
